attr.title: Alien Squatter
attr.desc: You are a homeless extraterrestrial living in a futuristic version of Japan. Humans are nearly extinct and Earth is a cesspool of pollution, urban decay, and economic inequality. Struggle to survive in this new style of RPG.
attr.desc_md:
You are a homeless extraterrestrial living in a futuristic version of Japan. Humans are nearly extinct and Earth is a cesspool of pollution, urban decay, and economic inequality. Struggle to survive in this new style of RPG.

Key Features:

- Choose from 3 alien species. All of them are weird aliens with cool abilities.
- Romance and befriend over 20 characters including a gangster, a breakdancer, a priest, a giant ooze, and a robot serial killer.
- Gain one of 5 pets, each with different abilities and unique personalities.
- Grow your physical, mental, and social stats, and use them to overcome obstacles.
- Do what it takes to survive. Forage, fight, fish, steal, salvage, sneak, shop, beg, get a job, sell your organs, party, get high, gamble, mutate, use psychic powers. - There are many paths to success.
- Be a good person or a scoundrel. The karma system tracks it all.
- Dozens of endings and achievements.
- Evocative descriptions bring the dystopian world to life. It's a really terrible place!
attr.inst: Download any version of the game from Steam or [Itch.io](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/alien-squatter), extract the zip file and copy the asquatter.rpg file into the the  aliensquatter port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download any version of the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1131750/Alien_Squatter/) or itch.io, extract the zip file and copy the asquatter.rpg file into the the  aliensquatter port folder.

attr.title: Apricots
attr.desc:
Apricots has nothing to do with apricots. It's a game where you fly a little plane around the screen and shoot things and drop bombs on enemy targets, and it's meant to be quick and fun.

Big thanks to [Moggers87](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots) for producing this game. 

The [source](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots)
attr.inst:
At present there is no option screen. Options can be changed by editing the configuration file apricots.cfg. This is first searched for in ~/.config/apricots/, then the system configuration directory (usually /usr/local/etc or /etc) and finally the default configuration in the data directory.

The number and type of planes can be varied, along with the airbases, as can 1/2 player game be chosen. The number of anti aircraft guns and scenery can be selected. Draks can be turned on or off, and a different condition for winning the game can be chosen.

attr.title: Arkovs Tower

The turn based combat system allows you to take your time and plan every move carefully. Upgrade your character with all sorts of items found in chests or dropped by enemies. This game is highly customizable for people with pixel art and/or programming experience.
attr.inst: Includes the Arkovs Tower Prologue version.  If you enjoy the game, please consider adding the full version to your steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2876720/Descent_from_Arkovs_Tower/

attr.title: BYTEPATH
attr.desc: BYTEPATH is a retro-inspired arcade game that combines fast-paced action with strategic skill-building. Players navigate through procedurally generated levels, battling waves of enemies while upgrading their ship and unlocking powerful abilities. With its pixel art aesthetics and challenging gameplay, BYTEPATH offers a nostalgic yet fresh experience for fans of classic arcade shooters.
attr.inst: All files are included. If you like the game, consider supporting the developer by purchasing it from https://store.steampowered.com/app/760330/BYTEPATH.

attr.title: BZFlag
attr.desc:
BZFlag is a 3D multi-player tank battle game that allows users to play against each  other
in  a  networked  environment.   There are five teams:  red, green, blue, purple and rogue
(rogue tanks are black).  Destroying a player on another team scores a  win,  while  being
destroyed  or  destroying  a  teammate  scores a loss.  Rogues have no teammates (not even
other rogues), so they cannot shoot teammates and they do not have a team score.
attr.inst:
All games files are included.
To enter your name START+D-PAD DOWN to enter Input mode UP / Down to enter your name and START to exit the Input mode.

attr.title: C-Dogs
attr.desc: C-Dogs is a classic overhead run-and-gun game
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cannonball
attr.desc: This is the libretro port of the OutRun game engine recreation written by Chris White in 2014.
attr.inst: Add the OutRun Revision B ROMs into /ports/cannonball/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Cannonball Standalone
attr.desc: CannonBall is an souped up game engine for the OutRun arcade game. The original 68000 and Z80 assembler code has been rewritten in C++. This makes it possible to make improvements suitable for modern platforms, including a higher frame-rate and widescreen support. It requires the original ROMs, as these contain elements including the graphics and audio data.
attr.inst:
Add the OutRun Revision B ROMs into /ports/cannonball/roms folder.
Support for console tracks and newer features

attr.title: Cards with Personalities
attr.desc: Single-player deck-building game full of charm! This deck-building game is trying to be accessible for both newcomers and veterans to the genre, with simple controls and clear rules. Still, each turn needs to be thought-out to beat the charming bosses!
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/2147020/Cards_with_Personalities/ and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Carmageddon
attr.desc: Carmageddon is the original freeform driving sensation, where pedestrians (and cows!) equal points, and your opponents are a bunch of crazies in a twisted mix of automotive killing machines.
attr.inst: You need to copy the original game files to ports/carmageddon folder.

attr.title: Carries' Order Up
attr.desc:
Carrie's Order Up! is a challenging arcade game inspired by the likes of Pac-Man and Game & Watch. As Carrie, a crab waitress in a port town's restaurant, you have to serve spaghetti, pancakes, and burgers to all kinds of sea creatures without bumping into them!

Mechanics may be simple, but a level of depth to the mechanics exist, with tons of achievements to reward those that learn to master being a crab waitress! If you're looking for a cute and challenging game that lifts inspiration from arcade titles, you'll find hours of entertainment in Carrie's Order Up!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/522490/Carries_Order_Up/ OR https://inkdragonworks.itch.io/carries-order-up 

From Itch:
Download CarriesOrderUp.zip from and unzip the contents to /ports/cariesorderup/gamedata

For Steam:
Download the game and copy the contents from /Carrie's Order Up! to /ports/cariesorderup/gamedata

attr.title: Castlevania 2 Simon's Quest Revamped
attr.desc: A wonderful fanmade revamp of the classic NES title, Castlevania 2 Simon's Quest.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Cat Tactics
attr.desc: Assume the role of Sprinkles and Spyro, cats out for revenge in this Tactical Turn-Based Mini-RPG in 64x64! Jump fences, climb trees and scale rooftops as you adventure through the neighbourhood.
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead
attr.desc: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead is a turn-based survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Struggle to survive in a harsh, persistent, procedurally generated world. Scavenge the remnants of a dead civilization for food, equipment, or, if you are lucky, a vehicle with a full tank of gas to get you the hell out of Dodge. Fight to defeat or escape from a wide variety of powerful monstrosities, from zombies to giant insects to killer robots and things far stranger and deadlier, and against the others like yourself, that want what you have…
attr.inst: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead has a very complex control scheme. Make sure to read the control section either on the Wiki or in the README file inside cataclysm-dda folder.

attr.title: Catacomb (1989)
attr.desc: Catacomb (1989-1990 DOS) contains 10 levels in this first release. Petton Everhail is contacted by Terexin, High Wizard of the Kieralon. Terexin informs him the Kieralon Empire has fallen. Petton must travel to the Kieralon Palace to collect the lost treasures of Terexin, who has offered to split them fifty-fifty. Petton agrees, puts down his cup of Orange Pekoe tea, and marches off for the Catacombs under the Kieralon Palace.
attr.inst: Copy your *.CAT files into ports/catacomb89/ and filenames should be uppercase.  If game files are lowercase, the launcher will attempt to convert them to uppercase automatically.  Both the floppy disk and GOG versions are compatible.

attr.title: Catacomb II
attr.desc: Catacomb II (Renamed to The Catacomb in 1991) contains 30 new levels and a few new monsters in this follow-up to the 1989-1990 release. Petton Everhail is contacted by Terexin, High Wizard of the Kieralon. Terexin informs him the Kieralon Empire has fallen. Petton must travel to the Kieralon Palace to collect the lost treasures of Terexin, who has offerd to split them fifty-fifty. Petton agrees, puts down his cup of Orange Pekoe tea, and marches off for the Catacombs under the Kieralon Palace.
attr.inst: Copy your *.CA2 files into ports/catacomb/ and filenames should be uppercase.  If game files are lowercase, the launcher will attempt to convert them to uppercase automatically.  Both the floppy disk and GOG versions are compatible.

attr.title: Cave Buster
attr.desc: Play as a little alien guy who crash landed into the core of a dangerous planet.  Make your way through fiery caverns and alien fauna.  Find the super duper Burger and eat it!
attr.inst:
1.Download 1 of the zip files from https://jontopielski.itch.io/cave-buster
2. Copy the "**.pck" file from your downloaded zip into the gamedata folder of the cavebuster folder in your ports. Then rename it to "cavebuster.pck".

attr.title: Cave Crawler
attr.desc: Cave Crawler is a short, 2D side-scrolling action platformer. Explore caves filled with interesting enemies and fun platforming challenges.
attr.inst:
Ready to Run! 
Special thanks to evan12811 for allowing PortMaster to distribute the game.

attr.title: Cave Express
attr.desc:
CaveExpress is a classic 2D platformer with physics-based gameplay and dozens of levels. Master your pedal-powered flying machine to pick up packages from your cave-dwelling clients and drop them off at the collection point.

But beware! Mighty mastodons, terrifying pterodactyls and others would rather see you extinct.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Cave Packer
attr.desc: CavePacker is a sokoban game. It is a puzzle game where you have to move the packages onto their targets without getting stuck. The lesser steps you made for solving a level, the better. You may only push but not pull packages.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Cave Story (Evo)
attr.desc: Cave Story using the Nxengine-evo engine from https://github.com/nxengine/nxengine-evo
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cave Story lr
attr.desc: Cave Story using the Libretro Retroarch Nxengine core.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Celeste
attr.desc: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight, hand-crafted platformer from the creators of multiplayer classic TowerFall.
attr.inst:
- Install the port via PortMaster.
- Download the Linux DRM-Free version of the game:
  - https://maddymakesgamesinc.itch.io/celeste
- Copy the game's data into "celeste/gamedata".
- Run the port, the first time setup will take a few minutes.
- Enjoy!
attr.inst_md:
- Install the port via PortMaster.
- Download the Linux DRM-Free version of the game:
  - [Itch.io Store: Celeste](https://maddymakesgamesinc.itch.io/celeste)
- Copy the Celeste Linux files into `celeste/gamedata`.
- Run the port, the first time setup will take a few minutes.
- Enjoy!

attr.title: Celeste Classic
attr.desc: Celeste Classic is a C source port of the original celeste (Celeste classic).
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Charge Kid
attr.desc: Charge Kid is a game where each jump is a puzzle. You can compare it to Portal, where you have to find clever uses of the mechanics and physics to "solve" each location by reaching the desired location. You have limited resources to make each jump, comparable to Celeste. But instead of focusing on precision-platforming, the game focuses on the puzzle aspect. Unlike Celeste, the hard part is figuring out how to use your resources to make each jump instead of the execution. But don't get fooled; the execution is also hard, which means finding each solution is even harder!
attr.inst: Ready to Run!
attr.inst_md:
If you liked the game, kindly consider supporting the devs at the following:
Itch.io: [https://eldskald.itch.io/charge-kid](https://eldskald.itch.io/charge-kid)
Steam: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334300/Charge_Kid/](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334300/Charge_Kid/)
Nintendo Switch eshop: [https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/charge-kid-switch/](https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/charge-kid-switch/)

attr.title: Chasm
attr.desc: Explore the depths below a remote mountain town in this procedurally-generated Adventure Platformer. Taking inspiration from hack 'n slash dungeon crawlers and Metroidvania-style platformers, Chasm will immerse you in a fantasy world full of exciting treasure, deadly enemies, and abundant secrets.
attr.inst: Copy the game's assets to the 'chasm/gamedata/' folder.

attr.title: Chess is Stupid
attr.desc: A small, weird Smash TV style shooter made by a painfully mediocre chess player who wanted to shoot the pieces after badly losing. Features all types of official chess piece, plus some made-up ones, funny stage names, tile breaking, like Battle Network, cutscenes, references to chess culture, if anyone cares, and UFO 50 palette
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Chip n Dale Rescue Rangers: Remastered
attr.desc: Nutcase was kidnapped by the cat Fatso, and Chip and Dale went to save her. As they begin the operation, they discover that the enemy has plotted more serious difficulties for the entire world. Not only will you need to help Gaika, but also destroy the antagonist's further plans. In the remaster, the developer completely changed the textures and character animations
attr.inst: Ready to run, launch CHIPNDALE.sh

attr.title: cityglitch
attr.desc: Cityglitch is an indie puzzle game where you play as a sorcerer saving a glitching city. Navigate fragmented urban landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and use magic to restore harmony. With a minimalist art style and soothing soundtrack, Cityglitch offers a captivating and thought-provoking experience.
attr.inst: Download the game from steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/756790/cityglitch/ or from itch https://mindfungus.itch.io/cityglitch and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Clannad
attr.desc: The story follows the life of Tomoya Okazaki, a high school delinquent who meets many people in his last year at school, including five girls, and helps resolve their individual problems. Follows a branching plot line which offers pre-determined scenarios with courses of interaction, and focuses on the appeal of the five female main characters by the player character.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/clannad/gamedata`.

attr.title: Clannad: Tomoyo After - It's A Wonderful Life
attr.desc: Tomoyo After continues the story of Tomoyo Sakagami after the events of Clannad, focusing on her relationship with Tomoya Okazaki and the challenges they face together. It explores themes of love, loss, and redemption against a backdrop of personal growth and emotional healing.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/tomoyo_after/gamedata`.

attr.title: ClassiCube
attr.desc: ClassiCube is a custom Minecraft Classic compatible client written in C from scratch.
attr.inst: Download and run. If your device doesn't have wifi, install ClassiCube on your PC and copy the "audio" and "texpacks" folders to the port directory.

attr.title: Cleaving Caliber
attr.desc: A Brick-Beaking, Rail-Shooting game trying to be a mixture of Silent Scope and Arkanoid. Get Powerups and use your best mental trigonometry to land Critical Shots!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cliff Hanger
attr.desc:
Traverse the different levels of this huge cave, in less than 12 seconds, or else, you die!

For some reason tho, time doesnt seem to keep going when you grab on ledges and maybe some other things, idk.

Make sure to collect all of those shiny diamond thingies, they surely are important for you, I assure you!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Climb
attr.desc: Climb is a bullet-ridden 2D platformer in which you play a knight fighting and climbing out of a prison tower with the help of a magical sword that shoots bullets! Includes 5 levels of increasing difficulty! Various enemy types! Traps! A unique mechanic where you shoot at the floor to jump higher! Single life challenge!
attr.inst: Download game from https://junchmakes.itch.io/climb, copy data.win to /ports/climb/gamedata

attr.title: Clockwind
attr.desc: The mechanic of this game is time travel. Make your way through 4 levels utilizing the passage of time in different ways. This may involve making trees grow or turning a car in to a flying car.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: ColorLines
attr.desc: A forked and updated version of SDL re-implementation of classic Color Lines game, originally written by Nikita Zimin in 2010.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Commander Genius
attr.desc: Commander Genius is an open-source clone of Commander Keen (Episodes 1-6, Dreams) which allows you to play these episodes and some of the mods and additional community content made for them. Developed by Gerstrong and originally ported by Christian Haitian.
attr.inst: Includes all of the officially released free content for Commander Keen: the shareware versions (Episodes 1 and 4), and the demo versions (Episode 6 and Keen Dreams). You can add load your own game file directories into the ports/cgenius/games folder or, if you have an internet connection on-device, you can download directly from the launcher (bottom left link) to access additional community created content.

attr.title: Community: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne
attr.desc:
This 2d platformer is based on Community's Digital Estate Planning episode. 

A group of warriors are summoned to the kingdom of Hawkthorne™ to take on a quest to recover the fabled "White Diamond of Discipline"™ found in the depths of the dark pit of despair known as The Black Cave™.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: CorsixTH
attr.desc: An opensource clone of Theme Hospital.
attr.inst: Load your Theme Hospital files into the ports/corsixth/HOSP folder.  As an example, the demo files of Theme Hospital is already included.

attr.title: Cosmo-Engine
attr.desc: A new game engine to play the MS-DOS game Cosmo's Cosmic Adventure on modern systems.
attr.inst: Episode 1 is included and you can add Episode 2 and 3 gamefiles to the data folder.

attr.title: Cro-Mag Rally
attr.desc: This is a port of Pangea Software’s racing game Cro-Mag Rally. Take control of the caveman Brog as you race through the  Stone, Bronze, and Iron Ages in primitive vehicles.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cropsmare!
attr.desc: A Sokoban-like puzzle game inspired by Adventures of Lolo.
attr.inst: You can purchase Cropsmare at: https://mrkdji.itch.io/cropsmare. Download the *cropsmare-linux.zip* version version and extract it, and place the *cropsmare.pck* file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested using the Linux version, but should also work with the Windows version.

attr.title: Crysalis
attr.desc:
Crysalis – the water of life. For generations, people lived their lives, blessed by the divine water. After finding out from the king that the town Ciuna’s Crysalis spring has run dry, Mio, a Crysalis researcher, is called in.

Go on an epic journey with Mio, and friends. Beautiful maps, elegant music, and fun areas to explore!
attr.inst: Copy Crysalis.exe (extract it from crysalis.zip) and RPGVXAce_RTP.zip in the roms/ports/crysalis folder.

attr.title: Crystals of Amalgam
attr.desc:
Your ship has been pulled into an interdimensional gap and is now trapped within a field of crystal orbs.

Match 3 or more orbs to destroy them. Mix primary colors to get a secondary color, or secondary colors to get a silver orb!

Silver orbs will give you special powers when you match them.

But be aware that time is your enemy. Don't let the orb wall reach the limit range or your ship will be destroyed.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Curse of the Arrow
attr.desc: Explore areas, solve puzzles, and fight against the curse that was imposed on you by an ancient statue! Your only weapon is a bow and a single arrow to defend yourself against your own corruption! Use your arrows as platforms, fight against enemies, toggle switches, and push boxes, and die (over and over)!
attr.inst: This game is ready to run!

attr.title: Curseball
attr.desc: Welcome To  Curseball! Your goal: hit the ball before time runs out. Simple, right?
attr.desc_md: *Welcome To  Curseball! Your goal: hit the ball before time runs out. Simple, right?*
attr.inst: This port is ready to run.
attr.inst_md: This port is ready to run.

attr.title: Cybarian
attr.desc: Cybarian The Time Travelling Warrior is a classically inspired arcade action game, with a mixture of modern and retro gaming tropes. Designed to be played through in a single sitting, there are limited checkpoints and no saves.
attr.inst: Download game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/928840/Cybarian_The_Time_Travelling_Warrior/ , rename Cybarian.exe to Cybarian.zip, extract, copy data.win and all .ogg files to /ports/cybarian/gamedata

attr.title: D-FENCER VS THE ORB
attr.desc: D-FENCER VS THE ORB is a short, experimental STG (shmup)
attr.inst: Download the game from https://danbo.itch.io/d-fencer-vs-the-orb and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Daikatana
attr.desc: Travel through time to fight a corrupted dictatorship and right the wrongs inflicted on the world.
attr.inst: You must add the retail data files from the 'data/' folder to the port's 'daikatana/gamedata/' folder.

attr.title: Dark Sheep
attr.desc: Dark Sheep is a block-pushing puzzle game with horror elements, and a love letter to the Commodore 64, both in visuals and audio! Plays like classic Sokoban with new twists that force you to find creative solutions!
attr.inst:
Grab the windows version from https://daisy-games.itch.io/dark-sheep
and copy DarkSheep.pck into ports/darksheep/gamedata

Text is harder to read on 320p, but playable. Works best on 480p and up.
attr.inst_md:
Grab the windows version from [itch.io](https://daisy-games.itch.io/dark-sheep)
and copy `DarkSheep.pck` into `/roms/ports/darksheep/gamedata`

Text is harder to read on 320p, but playable. Works best on 480p and up.

attr.title: Dave Gnukem
attr.desc: Dave Gnukem is a cross-platform 2D scrolling platform shooter inspired by Duke Nukem 1.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Daydreamer
attr.desc: A minimalistic boss battle shmup that truly challenges your skills with 18 bosses, each with its own challenging pattern. This is a strategy shmup that is on another level! You will die a lot!
attr.inst: Download from Nizakashii https://nizakashii.itch.io/daydreamer  Locate and place data.win & both .ogg files into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download from [Nizakashii](https://nizakashii.itch.io/daydreamer) Locate and place data.win & both .ogg files into gamedata folder.

attr.title: Dead Ice Deluxe
attr.desc: A small and kinda silly 1-v-1 Player-Vs-CPU Ice Hockey game, but the rink is full of zombies, powerups, mines, and meat.
attr.inst: All game files are included.

attr.title: Deep Sleep
attr.desc: It's morning and you gotta wake up for work, you hear the alarm clocks, but to wake up you need to collect all the clocks and escape the room before deep sleep ghosts catch you. They'll follow your every step and will eventually catch and make you fall into Deep Sleep if you're not careful. Use your Dream Pillow to traverse through 15 different and challenging levels! Good luck!
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Defshot
attr.desc: A 2D shooter made for the KoriJam
attr.inst:
Download defshot_linux64.zip from https://securas.itch.io/defshot
Extract the defshot_linux64.zip file
Copy the defshot.pck to your defshot ports folder Notes: Thanks to securas for creating this game and making it available for free on itch.io. Also thanks to Cebion for the packaging for portmaster.

attr.title: Demon Keep
attr.desc: Demon Keep is a minimalistic, classic roguelike with a dice rolling twist that is a kin to a mix between Porklike and Dicey Dungeons.
attr.inst: Download the game https://youdoyoubuddy.itch.io/demon-keep and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Demonizer
attr.desc: The fantasy bullet battle to end monstergirl genocide! Turn hateful humans into lovable demons in this 90s arcade style shooter, inspired by Raiden Fighters, Strikers 1945, and Battle Garegga.
attr.inst: You need to copy the game file (demonizer-demo.love or demonizer-full.love or demonizer demo.exe or ...) in gamedata directory and named it demonizer.love.

attr.title: Demonstone64
attr.desc: A cleverly built strategy/puzzle game where you are a Knight who must cleverly traverse each dungeon without being caught in the enemies path. One hit kill.
attr.inst: Download game at itch.io, extract and place Demonstone64.pck into gamedata folder.

attr.title: Depths of Limbo
attr.desc: Depths of Limbo is a action roguelike with a dark theme. The fast-paced combat is spiced up with a variety of unique items and weapons found throughout the procedurally generated world. It has elements of the Binding of Isaac's room by room then floor by floor style, and with Nuclear Throne's twin stick controls and focus on weapons and ammo.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/568400/Depths_of_Limbo/ and copy the .exe or .love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Der Clou!
attr.desc: A burglary simulation game originally created by neo Software Produktions GmbH.
attr.inst: Der Clou!'s files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Descent
attr.desc:
Play as a mercenary sent into planetary mines to destroy them before a computer virus spreads! You'll fly through 3D mazes in search of keycards to gain access to each level's reactor--which, once destroyed, will begin a self-destruct! Make sure you know where the exit hatch is! It will only open when the reactor is destroyed. Oh, and watch out for those virus-infected robots. They'll shoot at you.

Includes shareware/demo files. See instructions to use full version.
attr.inst: Ready to play with shareware and demo files. To upgrade to full game, purchase on Steam/GOG and then add .hog and .pig files to ports/descent/data.

attr.title: Descent II
attr.desc:
Return as a mercenary sent into deep space mines to destroy them before a computer virus spreads! You'll fly through 3D mazes in search of keycards to gain access to each level's reactor--which, once destroyed, will begin a self-destruct! Make sure you know where the exit hatch is! It will only open when the reactor is destroyed. Oh, and watch out for those virus-infected robots. They'll shoot at you.

Includes shareware/demo files. See instructions to use full version.
attr.inst: Ready to play with shareware and demo files. To upgrade to full game, purchase on Steam/GOG and then add .hog and .pig files to ports/descent2/data. Fully compatible with Descent 2: Vertigo and Descent Maximum levels!

attr.title: Descent III
attr.desc: Play the exciting final installment in the Descent trilogy! Saved by amateur do-gooders, the Material Defender sets out to stop the robot virus and Dravis' evil plans once and for all! Pilot through 3D space, navigating through familiar indoor mines and outdoor open space terrain. It's a big universe, but fortunately they threw in a guidebot.
attr.inst: Purchase the full game from GOG or Steam, or use CD game data patched to v1.4. Then, add data files to `descent3/gamedata`. See the readme for specific files needed.

attr.title: Destructivator
attr.desc:
Destructivator is a retro styled platform shooter for the gamer that enjoys a challenge - 20 levels of fast and furious arcade action. Blast your way to Zallagor's lair to rid the world of this evil monster, blah blah blah etc...

Basically just shoot all the bad guys.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://pugfuglygames.itch.io/destructivator and place the contents of the zip into the /gamedata folder

attr.title: Destructivator 2
attr.desc: A platform shooter that brings 90's gaming smashing into your face! Blast and insta-melee your way through hordes of alien soldiers, robots, bosses and loads more. Fight on foot, in a fighter or in a bomber. Take on bosses and ensure that the alien menace won't threaten Earth ever again!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1124990/Destructivator_2/
Download the game and from your Steam library, right click on Destructivator 2>  Manage > Browse local files. Copy the data.win to /ports/destructivator2/gamedata

attr.title: DevilutionX
attr.desc: DevilutionX is a source port of Diablo from https://github.com/diasurgical/devilutionX.
attr.inst: Includes the Diablo shareware version.  You can add your own full version DIABDAT.MPQ file to the ports/devilution folder.  To run the Diablo: Hellfire expansion you will need to also copy hellfire.mpq, hfmonk.mpq, hfmusic.mpq, hfvoice.mpq. See wiki if you experience issues with version upgrades or configuration changes.

attr.title: DEVOLVER Bootleg
attr.desc: Devolver Bootleg contains 8 original rip offs of Devolver games.

attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1066260/Devolver_Bootleg/) Locate the data.win, MAP File, DUNGEON File, 2 folders and copy them into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Dinothawr
attr.desc: Dinothawr is a block pushing puzzle game on slippery surfaces.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Diver Down
attr.desc: Diver Down is a stealth-platformer. Avoid the lights on 20 different stages using your mysterious Diver Down ability, that allows you to dive onto solids! .
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Dome Romantik
attr.desc: Dig your way through to the core of the planet. Mine minerals, bring them back to your dome and install upgrades just in time to defend from hostile lifeforms.
attr.inst: Launch DomeRomantik.sh

attr.title: Donut Dodo
attr.desc: If a long lost arcade game from 1983 resurfaced today, it would be Donut Dodo -- a classic 2D platformer from the golden era, tough as nails and challenging for the whole family! Ready to top the high score table?
attr.inst:
You can purchase Donut Dodo at: https://zapposh.itch.io/donut-dodo-retropie-edition

Download and extract it, and place the DonutDodo.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with DonutDodo_1_39.zip

attr.title: Doom 3
attr.desc: Doom 3 is a 2004 survival horror first-person shooter video game developed by id Software and published by Activision.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/doom3/base folder.

attr.title: Downwell
attr.desc: Downwell is a curious game about a young person venturing down a well in search of untold treasures with only his Gunboots for protection. Make your way further and further down into the darkness filled with nasty creatures and mysterious secrets to collect the spectacular red gems scattered about the rocks. Step into precariously placed shops and buy some helpful items or level up between levels to battle well-dwelling monsters and uncover hidden caves filled with riches and relics. No two trips down the well are ever the same!
attr.inst:
Purchase and download the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/360740/Downwell/ OR  https://www.gog.com/en/game/downwell.
Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/downwell/gamedata.

attr.title: Dr. Bloodshot

The objective is to reach the well secured laboratory of Dr. Bloodshot, which can be done by sabotaging various power stations across the mansion.

attr.title: ElecHead

He can also detach and throw his head to trigger things remotely, but be careful: if he doesn't get his head back within ten seconds, he will shut down. Elec will have to use his head, literally and figuratively, to find a way out of this trap-ridden facility.

attr.title: Frozen Bubble

attr.title: Galaxy Forces 2
attr.desc:
A great multiplayer game brought to you by [Ronnie Hedlund](https://sourceforge.net/u/rh_galaxy/profile/). The source code is available [here.](https://sourceforge.net/p/galaxyv2/code/HEAD/tree/)

A 2D multiplayer space shooter, inspired by the Amiga classic Gravity Force. Play race, mission or dogfight. Single player, with friends or against AI. There are 50+ levels and a map-editor included.

Global hi-score and achievements with replays on the website.

Features

    Space shooter
    Multiplayer
    Online hiscore
    Replays
    Race
    Dogfight
    Mission
    AI
    Editor
    Cross platform
attr.inst:
Start the program

Multiple instances of the game may be started on the same machine for testing.
The server (Server.exe) need only be run if you want a stand alone server.
Firewall ports

TCP port 1999 needs to be forwarded in your firewall/router to be able to host games and have other players join you.
Login as member

To use achievements and hiscores you need to create a user here.
Then login as that user, or select cancel to just play directly.
Connect to server

Enter the IP address or host name of a server and click "connect".
You can enter 127.0.0.1 to connect to your own server.
All games on that server will be shown.
You can join green games.
You can't join red games, they are full or already started.
If no game is shown you have to create a new game.
Join existing game

Enter your name and choose a green game from the list.
Click "Join".
Create new game

Enter your name, and the name of the game.
Click "New".
Start game

The player that created the game should set the level to play and make other settings before starting the game. This player will be the master.
Others that have joined can only chat until the game starts.

The master can kick players by selecting a player and press delete.
If the master leaves the game, mastership is transferred to another player.

attr.title: Hallow's Eve

Set in the 90s, play as Ichabod, a pumpkin man who uses his chance to enter the human world to try and rent Jurassic Park from the video store. Unfortunately, the only copy has been rented by a teen who’s brought a witch’s curse upon the town.

Gameplay is inspired by the classics and the modern classics — a Zeldalike sense of exploration, with the tight, fast combat of Hyper Light Drifter. All soaked in a charming pixel art atmosphere and a dumb sense of humor. Playtime is around 1-2 hours.
attr.inst: Buy the game from https://maxatrillionator.itch.io/hallows-eve and place the .solarus file in the ports/hallowseve folder.

attr.title: Little Runmo
attr.desc:
Little Runmo - The Game, is a 2D platformer game originating from an animated Youtube film called "Little Runmo" made by the creator Gooseworx. The Story revolves around a fictional videogame character trying to survive with his last life.

The gameplay of Little Runmo - The Game, is based on the video but also takes inspiration from the Super Mario games. For fans that come from the animation, the game is not a 1 to 1 replica of the animated film. I am not trying to make this a hardcore Meatboy-type game, I want to introduce challenging moments but I will try to make the difficulty curve as smooth as possible.

The early game will be pretty chill, just imagine how the Mario games were designed, then newer harder mechanics get slowly introduced. Big inspirations again were Mario World and Super Mario Bros Wii and also a fan-game called Mario 63.
attr.inst: None

attr.title: LOVE by Fred Wood
attr.desc:
LOVE is a short and addictively challenging platformer with a minimalist design. It has a custom respawn system, 16 levels, 12 track original soundtrack, competitive scoring, and multiple ways to play.
The difficult levels are balanced with the inclusion of a simple yet unique respawn system wherein the player can leave a checkpoint at any location at any point, as long as they are on solid ground.
Beyond the visual aesthetic, the challenging level design, and the abundance of features, there is the fantastic soundtrack composed by James Bennett, which brings rich life to the seemingly simple three-color atmosphere.
attr.inst:
Purchase and download LOVE (3.0.1, Linux) or (3.0.1, Windows) from https://thatsmytrunks.itch.io/love.
Copy the files (game.unx/data.win, icon.png, love_love.csv, options.ini) from /assets into the /gamedata folder

attr.title: Luck be a Landlord
attr.desc: Your landlord is knocking on your door. You have one coin left to your name. You insert the coin into your slot machine...and...JACKPOT! Luck be a Landlord, tonight! Luck be a Landlord is a roguelike deck-builder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.
attr.inst:
You'll need to purchase the game from `https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404850/Luck_be_a_Landlord`. You'll need a specific release, which you can obtain using a tool like DepotDownloader (https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader). There are also GUIs for DepotDownloader, like https://depotdownloader.00pium.net. The command may vary depending on your system, but the `-app`, `-depot`, and `manifest` digits must match those below:

`./DepotDownloader -app 1404850 -depot 1404853 -manifest 5385995170406685945 -username <STEAM_USERNAME> -password <STEAM_PASSWORD>`

Once you've grabbed this, locate the *Luck be a Landlord.pck* file and place this in the port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.desc: An open-source voxel sandbox game engine. Lots of free community-made games and mods to download straight from the client. Inspired by InfiniMiner, Minecraft, and the like.
attr.inst:
Ready to run.

Some menus extend off-screen for some devices, however all configuration options can be adjusted at `/path/to/your/ports/minetest/minetest.conf`. Settings options are described here: http://doxy.minetest.net/settings.html

Single-player play requires >1 GB in order to run both the host and client instances. So 1 GB devices should stick to server play because RAM requirements are only ~700 MB. There are public servers available or you can host your own private server!

attr.title: Moonlight New
attr.desc: "Moonlight Embedded is an open source client for Sunshine and NVIDIA GameStream for embedded Linux systems. Moonlight allows you to stream your full collection of games and applications from your PC to other devices to play them remotely". Now with a brand new custom-made launcher!"
attr.desc_md: *"Moonlight Embedded is an open source client for [Sunshine](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine) and NVIDIA GameStream for embedded Linux systems. Moonlight allows you to stream your full collection of games and applications from your PC to other devices to play them remotely"* Now with a brand new custom-made launcher!"
attr.inst: Install the latest version of Sunshine on your PC and use the launcher to pair to your pc. Full instructions are on the PortMaster site!
attr.inst_md:
- Install the latest version of [Sunshine](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine/releases) on your PC *(GFE is not updated anymore but may give good results for NVIDIA users)*
- This guide will use the windows installer version. 
- Run the installer, agree with the terms. Wait for it to finish.
- Open Sunshine for the first time. It will open up a window in your default browser.
- It may give a warning about your connection not being private. Click on advanced and continue to localhost.
- Here you will set the username and password for Sunshine, set it to something simple and memorable. It will ask for it every time.
- The page will reload and then you will log into Sunshine. 
- Now its time to open Moonlight on your handheld. 
- First head to the *"Settings Menu"* and set them how you would like. Preferably start off with a low bitrate and your devices native resolution and framerate. 
- Lets move to the *"Connect Menu"*. Here you will first set your host device IP-address. 
- You will be able to find this by going to your network settings, properties and under *"IPv4 address"*.
- Now its time to pair. Head to the *"Pin"* section on your host PC. 
- Click *"Pair"* in the Moonlight port. This will now show a pin. Fill this pin into Sunshine. Also fill in the device name, this can be named after your device such a *"RG35XX"*. 
- After sending the signal on you host PC, you will receive a message *"Succesfully paired"* in the moonlight app on your handheld. 
- Head over to the *"Reload Apps"* function on your handheld. Click on it and you will see the currently configured apps from Sunshine. Every time you update the Apps in Sunshine, use this function.
- Head to the *"Play Menu"* and select the app you want to stream, Steam for example. 
- The Moonlight app will close on your handheld and it will start streaming. Wait 5 seconds for the controls.
- Have fun!

## Recommendations: ##
- Moonlight requires a very good internet connection to get a decent experience. There are many factors at play such a the detail of the game your running. Simpler 2d games are easier to stream and require less power to decode on your handheld. You will have to try and find a balance of bitrate and framerate for your setup. 
- Experiencing input and/or audio delay? Lower the bitrate, resolution, or framerate. Reconnecting may help random desyncing issues.
- Moonlight will maintain aspect ratio of your host PC monitor. You can get a better picture by manually changing the resolution to your devices native resolution, such as 640x480. There are ways to automate this process, such as  [ResolutionAutomation](https://github.com/Nonary/ResolutionAutomation). Use these programs on your own risk.
- Inputs may be reversed. Mouse mode does not work on Moonlight-Embedded. Both can be resolved by using SteamInput.
- Its recommended to check your connection before streaming, use the pair function for this. Does it say *"Already paired"*, then youre good to go. It may also say something like *"App already opened"*, you need to use *"Force Close"* under the troubleshooting options in Sunshine.
- Most important of all, dont expect an amazing experience going in. These handhelds are not ideal for Streaming, even though they may seem like it.

attr.title: Mythos
attr.desc:
Esote is one of many small towns located within Daedalis's Great Labyrinth, formed years after the Legendary Hero Theseus defeated the awful minotaur. Although Theseus was able to escape the Labyrinth many of the remaining survivors who couldn't had to settle down resigning themselves to forever live trapped within. You (Sophos) have gotten fed up with the defeatist attitude all the townsmen carry on their faces, you hate the solemn and quiet atmosphere that persists day to day. After hearing tales of the Outside from your late parents years ago you decide to go see it for yourself. What is there to fear?
Make decisions and manipulate your escape chance. It's up to you whether you FIND THE EXIT or STAY LOST

attr.title: Nidhogg
attr.desc:
Nidhogg is the epic award-winning fencing tug-of-war, full of graceful acrobatics and clumsy stabs. IRL yelling and excitement may occur, in this ultimate two-player showdown of fast-paced fencing and melee attacks.
The combat arena stretches in both directions, although besting an opponent only gains you ground. Matches aren’t won or lost with a single kill, but with a series of kills granting you right-of-way to run/fight/flee to your own goal-zone.
Each arena holds different strategic formations and chokepoints to use to your advantage. Until you reach your goal-zone, anything is possible. Only one thing is certain in Nidhogg… the only way to win is to outwit your opponent. En Garde!

Note: Only single player available for this port!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/94400/Nidhogg/
From your Steam Library, Right-Click Nidhogg and select Properties. Go to Betas and select "before_may_2017 - before_may_2017"
Download and install the before_may_2017 version. After installation is complete, from your steam library, Right-Click Nidhogg [before_may_2017] and select Manage > Browse local files
Copy all the files from this folder into ports/nidhogg/gamedata
On first startup, the game will patch and put the files in the appropriate places.

attr.title: Ocean's Heart
attr.desc:
When pirates attacked Limestone Island, it fell to Tilia’s father to go after them and rescue the young woman they kidnapped. When he hasn’t returned six months later, Tilia decides it’s up to her to track down her dad and find out what went wrong.

Play as Tilia as she travels across an archipelago full of pirate forts, forgotten magic, abominable beasts, and a diverse cast of people trying to find their place in it all. As Tilia follows her dad’s trail, she becomes entrangled in the pirates’ plot to use an old magic to control the ocean. And maybe along the way, she’ll play in a tick-tack-toe championship, prevent an art heist, or impresonate a piano tuner. It’s a large world full of secrets, dangers, and quirky wierdos for you to explore.
attr.inst: Buy the game from GOG or Steam and place the data.solarus file in the ports/oceansheart folder.

attr.title: Oddworld: Abes Oddysee Exoddus
attr.desc: It is a platformer with puzzle-solving elements.
attr.inst: You need to copy all .lvl and .ddv files (and sound.dat for Exoddus) from the original game(s) to either ports/oddysee or ports/exoddus directory.

attr.title: Omega Strike
attr.desc: Omega Strike is a metroidvania game with a vast, open ended world and multiple playable characters. Explore the world, learn new abilities, upgrade your weapons and defeat Doctor Omega and his mutant armies!
attr.desc_md: *"Omega Strike is a metroidvania game with a vast, open ended world and multiple playable characters. Explore the world, learn new abilities, upgrade your weapons and defeat Doctor Omega and his mutant armies!"*
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam. Add the assets to the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/680340/Omega_Strike/). Add the assets to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Open Great Giana Sisters
attr.desc: Open Great Giana Sisters is a Free Software/Open Source implementation/remake of The Great Giana Sisters.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: OpenBlok
attr.desc: A customizable, cross platform, open-source falling block game, packed with a bunch of features.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenClaw
attr.desc: A Reimplementation of the 1997 Captain Claw platformer.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: OpenFodder
attr.desc: Open Fodder is an open source version of the Cannon Fodder engine.
attr.inst: It comes with demo files, you can add the full version files by reading the included README.md

attr.title: OpenJazz
attr.desc: A free, open-source version of the classic Jazz Jackrabbit games by Alister Thomson.
attr.inst: Includes the Jazz Jackrabiit shareware files.  You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/openjazz/gamedata folder.

attr.title: OpenMRac
attr.desc: OpenMRac is a split-screen racing game. It is a tweaked source release of MultiRacer.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenOMF
attr.desc: An Open Source remake of 'One Must Fall 2097' by Diversions Entertainment.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenRCT2
attr.desc: OpenRCT2 is Open source re-implementation of RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.
attr.inst: Add your Roller Coaster Tycoon 2 game files to the ports/openrct2/RCT2 directory, and optionally add your Roller Coaster Tycoon 1 files to ports/openrct2/RCT1.

attr.title: OpenSupaplex
attr.desc: OpenSupaplex is a 1:1 reimplementation of the original game in C and SDL, with just a few changes to make it easy to use with game controllers, and also easy to port to any platform.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play. Every levelset requires a there to be a player created. Levelset 1 had a premade PLAYER1 created but all others will require you to create a new one. You can use start + dpad down to enter text input mode.

attr.title: OpenSyobon
attr.desc: An SDL-based cross-platform port of Syobon Action
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenTyrian
attr.desc: OpenTyrian is an open-source port of the DOS game Tyrian.
attr.inst: OpenTyrian 2.1 files are already included as they were made freeware sometime ago.

attr.title: OpenXcom Extended
attr.desc: OXCE is an open source engine for running XCOM:Ufo Defense and Terror From the Deep.
attr.inst: You will need to provide your own UFO Defense/TFTD game files.  Read the README-port.txt file for details.

attr.title: Operius
attr.desc: Operius is a game where you shoot and dodge enemies inside a tunnel while going through an infinite amount of levels!
attr.inst: Ready to Run!

attr.title: Oquonie
attr.desc:
Oquonie is a textless isometric puzzle game.

You must make your way through a seemingly endless succession of rooms. You will not be alone. Your incarnations will have the help of bizaroid characters that speak an obscure language.
attr.inst: Place  oquonie.rom from https://hundredrabbits.itch.io/oquonie into the oquonie folder.

attr.title: Osana's Revenge
attr.desc: Osana's Revenge is a top down shooter filled with memes and private jokes arisen from Yandere Simulator drama and development setbacks, in particular, its first rival (Osana Najimi) being delayed for multiple years. However, you don't have to be familiar with all of this in order to play and enjoy it.
attr.inst: Add the .solarus file from here: https://metaquarius.itch.io/osanas-revenge to the ports/osanasrevenge folder.

attr.title: Otto Matic
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software’s Otto Matic. Take control of the robot Otto Matic and save earth from aliens from Planet X
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Out of Ammo
attr.desc: A mix of retro shmup (think Judgement Silversword) and breakout, in the style of something like The Lost Shield or Wizorb, with aesthetics hugely inspired by ZeroRanger (because it's brilliant, and green+orange goes well with EVERYTHING).
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: OutlawN
attr.desc: Are you ready for 16 levels of OLD WEST LAWN MOWIN' ACTION!? Are you a bad enough buddeh to fight 4 types of lawmen AND snakes while takin' care of a LAWN?! Well, OutlawN is for you!
attr.inst:
Download free at itch.io https://programancer.itch.io/outlawn-retrogradejam2
Copy data.win into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
Download free at [itch.io](https://programancer.itch.io/outlawn-retrogradejam2)
Copy data.win into gamedata folder.

attr.title: OverGun
attr.desc: OverGun is a shoot'em up 2D platform where your character’s weapon is bigger than he can handle! Take control of the crazy pixeled shooter to help him keep control of his gun and bullets through the dungeon.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Owlboy
attr.desc: A story-driven platform adventure game, where you can fly and explore a brand new world in the clouds.  Text is not readable on devices with screens less than 5 inches.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Owlboy for Linux copied to the ports/owlboy/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Pacman
attr.desc: A clone of the original regular ol' Pacman by Namco.  This version is inspired by Paul Neave's Pacman.
attr.inst: Everything is included and ready to run!

attr.title: Panic Room
attr.desc: You are a skeleton in a very small dungeon, and more traps keep appearing. You have no choice but to delay your inevitable doom by collecting as many coins as possible... or do you? How long can you last? Where are these spikes coming from? Will you ever be free?
attr.inst:
Download PANIC ROOM v1.1.0.exe from https://ghostomato.itch.io/panic-room and place it in the /ports/panicroom/ folder.
On first startup, the game will patch and put the files in the appropriate places.

attr.title: Panzer Paladin
attr.desc: The sinister Ravenous and his legions of brutal demons are poised for battle. The situation is dire, but humanity has one final ace in the hole: the Panzer Paladin!
attr.inst: Copy all the files from your Steam Windows copy of the game to `/roms/ports/panzerpaladin/gamedata`. PanzerPaladin.exe, a bunch of dll files and the Content folder should be directly inside of gamedata

attr.title: PAUSED
attr.desc: What do ducks have to do with rabbits? Exactly, adventure and physics stuff are what you are looking for.
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pekka Kana 2
attr.desc: Pekka Kana 2 (Pekka the Rooster 2) is a jump 'n run game made in the spirit of old classic platformers such as Super Mario, Sonic the Hedgehog, Jazz Jackrabbit, Super Frog and so on.
attr.inst: Pekka Kana 2 files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pepper Pengui
attr.desc:
It looks like the penguin is having a bad day. Flaming thugs have cut off your nap and now are destroying the silent cave.

Help the penguin to end the party before things get too hot!

 

HOW TO PLAY

Eliminate all invaders using your egg bomb, but beware of hot areas as you will have difficulty moving through them.

You can restore the ice using your snotty sneeze. It will undo the heat and can also block enemies.

In case you end up getting stuck, sneeze over a block to break it. Use the bomb timer to your advantage.. also it is possible to push it forward in order to make a surprise attack!
attr.inst: READY to RUN

attr.title: Pigeon Ascent
attr.desc: *Optimized for 4:3 640x480 and 5:3 1920x1152*. Take care of your own pigeon as they fight increasingly stronger foes, and then face the legendary Pigeon God at the end... can you keep death far from your bird?
attr.inst: Pigeon Ascent files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pinball Disc Room
attr.desc: How did you end up in this pinball of death? The blades teleport in. Dodge the discs to survive. Knock down the popups to open the passage way but beware you can't control when you exit.
attr.inst: All game files included

attr.title: Pingo
attr.desc:
Pingo is a puzzle game in which your goal is to paint the whole level in as little steps as possible.
Try to earn all 3 stars in 60 hand crafted levels!
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Plague
attr.desc: PLAGUE is heavily inspired on Gargoyle's Quest for the original Gameboy. It's a platformer where you can control a plague doctor, throwing explosive potions and dashing mid-air.
attr.inst: Ready 2 Run

attr.title: Planet Waves
attr.desc: An arcade tower defense about protecting a small planet made for the gotm.io jam #3 by Escada Games
attr.inst: All files already included. Run PlanetWaves.sh

attr.title: Planetarian
attr.desc: Planetarian is a visual novel set in a post-apocalyptic world where a lone survivor encounters a malfunctioning robot attendant named Yumemi Hoshino in an abandoned planetarium. Through their interactions, themes of hope, humanity, and the enduring power of memories are explored.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/planetarian/gamedata`.

attr.title: Plaque Attack Remake
attr.desc: *Optimized for 4:3 and 16:9 (or similar ex. rg552). Could scale weirdly on gameboy like aspect ratio.* Atari 2600's Plaque Attack game remake made for Highjam #1 by Escada Games.
attr.inst: Plaque attack Remake files are already included and ready to go. To Force a particular version rename the desired one in the installation folder as PlaqueAttackRemake.zip and delete the other one, then boot.

attr.title: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties
attr.desc: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties is an adult-oriented "romantic comedy" visual novel/dating sim developed by United Pixtures and published by Kirin Entertainment for the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer. Although the game did have a Microsoft Windows version, it had very limited distribution and was published by United Pixtures itself. The game stars Edward J. Foster and Jeanne Basone as John and Jane, respectively; two people who are being pressured by their respective parents to go out and find a spouse. The player's task is to get John and Jane together.
attr.inst: This port requires the pc version. Copy GAME.BIN and folders SC00 - SC32 and SC99 to the DATA folder

attr.title: Pocket Tactics
attr.desc:
A GameBoy themed reimplementation of Tiny Tactics

After the collapse of human civilization, rogue warriors fight for scraps on the surface, fighting for what few remnants they can find from the old world, and sheltering in caves from the chemically modified rain that pours like thick soup onto the landscape below.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Pocket Wonder Sport
attr.desc: 10 totally not bootleg games in 1 cartridge file! Inspired by weird rom collections on pirate multicarts, but hopefully with a tiny bit more quality.
attr.inst: All game files are included. Thanks to Harley Wilson at https://hwilson.itch.io/pocket-wonder-sport for creating the game and allowing us to distribute.

attr.title: Post Void
attr.desc: Post Void is a hypnotic scramble of early first-person shooter design that values speed above all else. Keep your head full and reach the end; Kill what you can to see it mend; Get the high score or try again.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1285670/Post_Void/
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console. 
Download the 1.1.0 version by typing: download_depot 1285670 1285671 8969891914873217769 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy data.win and options.ini from the download folder to /ports/postvoid/gamedata

attr.title: Powder
attr.desc: A roguelike is a dungeon crawler where no two games are the same. The maps are different, the items are different, there are no guaranteed win paths.
attr.inst: Powder files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Power Level
attr.desc: You have 5 minutes to explore a randomly generated dungeon and gear up for a tough boss fight. Search for treasure, upgrades, and that glorious EXP in this quick-paced action game!
attr.inst: Download game from https://smithmanc.itch.io/power-level,  copy all files except the .exe to /ports/powerlevel/gamedata

attr.title: Prehistorik 2
attr.desc: A caveman-era platform game using the Blues Brothers game engine developed by Titus Interactive.
attr.inst: Includes the demo files. You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/prehistorik2/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Prototype
attr.desc: This is ProtoType, an RType remake from Dark Castle Software. This version compile on OpenPandora, Linux, ODROID and AmigaOS4, has the FMOD dependancy removed (using SDL_mixer instead, but can be re-activated), and has a few fixes in the code. This game now use stb_image for Image Loading.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Psebay
attr.desc: Psebay is an atmospheric adventure in moto trial genre. Features exciting gameplay with dynamic gravity, special atmosphere and unique sound, stunning scenery in silhouette style, and comfortable and easy controls.
attr.inst: Download apk version 4.0.21 from https://d.apkpure.com/b/APK/com.butakov.psebay?versionCode=4000021 , rename to psebay.apk, place in /ports/psebay

attr.title: Pulstario
attr.desc:
Pulstario is a small game in which you pilot a ship through the void and collect missing souls. It has challenging moments and hopefully the gameplay is a rewarding experience. From the creator of LOVE and kuso.

Pulstario is a short game that will likely take a player 30 minutes to complete the main game. There are also achievements, secret levels, and unlockable ship skins for the player to earn and collect.

The gameplay for Pulstario has been described as:

"Wobbly Free Range Pac-Man"
"Lunar Lander - Without the landing"
"Asteroids with gravity"
"Luftrausers for Pacifists"
attr.inst:
Purchase and download Pulstario_Linux_DRMFree_V001.zip OR Pulstario_Windows_DRMFree_V001.zip from https://thatsmytrunks.itch.io/pulstario.
Copy all the files (game.unx/data.win, options.ini) from /assets or the zip into the pulstario/gamedata folder

attr.title: PuPaiPo Space Deluxe
attr.desc:
PuPaiPo Space is a colorful space shoot-em-up in which you travel from Stage to Stage in search of the legendary space pizza. Piloting your trusty spaceship, you will have to battle waves of opponents, dodge hundreds of bullets, pick sweet power ups and face powerful bosses!

Travel through 7 different stages. Jumping from one stage to another requires your space jumping engine to recharge for roughly 90 seconds. During that time you will have to defend yourself from all the opponents in the area and defeat its boss.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/pupaipo-space-deluxe or from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148500/PuPaiPo_Space_Deluxe/

Itch:
Download PuPaiPo Space DX - Linux and copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1148500 1148502 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata

attr.title: Pure Metal: Feature 1
attr.desc: Base has been attacked and you are the last hope of saving Pure Metal. Shoot down hoards of enemies and unforgiving bosses in classic shooter style. Touch controls feature smooth analog from the onscreen D-pad. Use the arrow keys and the z and x buttons to shoot the enemy with the keyboard. You have one life to make it through each level, but don't worry your ship can take 3 consecutive hits before being destroyed. Also your ship will regenerate to full power if you can manage to avoid enemy fire long enough. Bob and weave your way through the enemy fire and kill every thing in site. This game is designed to brutally come after you but pay attention and look for the patterns and avoid the onslaught of bullets.
attr.inst: Just copy the game.win or data.win inside the gamedata folder. Windows store version works too.

attr.title: Putrid Shot Ultra
attr.desc: A chaotic shoot-em-up roguelite with magic spell casting. Defeat enemies with your gun! Stack tons of passive spells that trigger when you shoot while weaving your unique active spell in between. Blast your enemies with gunfire and magic spells while you dodge through the rubble.
attr.inst: Download the game (demo or full version) https://store.steampowered.com/app/2053360/PUTRID_SHOT_ULTRA/ and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Puztrix Playdate
attr.desc: Puztrix Playdate is the Playdate version of a remake of the Gravnic game from inside the NES Puzznic game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Pyk
attr.desc: Quick abstract arcade game that requires good reflexes and dexterity but sometimes patience and precision. You control a round being that must avoid Bad Red Shapes. Those enemies will try to cut, smash, shoot, crush, wreck, burn, or shatter you -- so be quick and careful. Collect all keys to unlock blockades and find the teleporter to next level.
attr.inst: You can download Pyk for free at: https://rafalkowalski.itch.io/pyk. Download the *Pyk_1.0.zip* (Windows) version and extract it, and place the *pyk.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Quake 1
attr.desc: Quake 1 is one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: Includes shareware pak file.  You can add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake/quakepaks/id1 folder.

attr.title: Quake 2
attr.desc: Quake 2 is the sequel to Quake 1, one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake2/baseq2 folder.

attr.title: Quake 3
attr.desc: Quake III Arena is a 1999 multiplayer-focused first-person shooter developed by id Software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files and product key to the ports/quake3/baseq3 folder.

attr.title: Quakespasm
attr.desc:
QuakeSpasm is a modern, cross-platform Quake game engine by sezero based on FitzQuake. This source port of quake supports many mods and Dimension of the Machine.

Quakespasm-for-GL4ES (https://github.com/Slayer366/quakespasm-for-GL4ES) based on (https://github.com/jfgomez21/quakespasm) who began modifying Quakespasm to work with GL4ES.
attr.inst: You will need to populate the id1, hipnotic, rogue, dopa, ad, and mg1 directories with your pak files and music tracks.  Some JelOS users may need to use flac instead of ogg or mp3.  It is recommended to use an RK3566 or faster CPU to run Arcane Dimensions or Dimension of the Machine.

attr.title: R&Watch-Dobtopus
attr.desc: A tight boss rush that's a challenge without being too brutal. The graphics have a sleek minimalist style with loads of visual flairs.
attr.inst: -Download at (https//:nizakashii.itch.io/R&Watch)-Extract and place data.win into gamedata folder

attr.title: RagingBlasters
attr.desc: Raging Blasters is a vertical scroll shmup featuring high speed scrolling and the exhilaration of destruction.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from steam. Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/ragingblasters/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase and download the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1464550/RagingBlasters/ 

Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/ragingblasters/gamedata.

attr.title: Rakuen
attr.desc: Rakuen is an adventure game about a little Boy who lives in the hospital. One day, the Boy asks his Mom to escort him to the fantasy world from his favorite storybook, so that he can ask the Guardian of the Forest to grant him one wish. In order to receive his wish, the Boy must complete a set of challenges that revolve around helping his neighbors in the hospital by interacting with their alter-egos in the fantasy world...
attr.inst: Add the contents of your rakuen copy into the rakuen/gamedata/ folder.

attr.title: Randungeon
attr.desc: a simple roguelike make for a gamejam
attr.inst: locate and move pck file to gamedata.

attr.title: Raptor
attr.desc: Reversed-engineered source port from Raptor Call Of The Shadows
attr.inst: Shareware files are included and game is ready to run. See readme for detailed instructions for full version game files and other configuration options. In the name and callsign section, make sure the crosshair is not on input fields, press start + down to enable text entry. Press start once done to complete entry.

attr.title: RAWGL
attr.desc: A re-implementation of the engine used in the game Another World aka Out of this World in the US.
attr.inst: Includes the Out of this World demo files.  You can add your own full game files to the ports/rawgl/gamedata/ folder.  See https://github.com/cyxx/rawgl#supported-versions for more supported files info.

attr.title: Rebound
attr.desc: Rebound is a side scrolling rpg inspired by lisa the painful BBQ Quest and paper mario
attr.inst:
download the game from Itch https://rebound.itch.io/rebound tested with Windows version. extract fishing update contents to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.

attr.title: Red Handsome Hood
attr.desc:
Join Red Handsome Hood on his journey, having only his hood, thong and knuckles, there is nothing that can stop this strong man! Or is there? The path is full of dangerous opponents, but he is just as dangerous!

The charming run of an untold tale, but we are not going to tell it, YOU can tell us what you think the story is about!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run.
Special thanks to BolHut games and and Jaime Gifte(@GIFTEador) for allowing the distribution of the game via PortMaster 
Source: https://bolhut.itch.io/red-handsome-hood

attr.title: Red Trees
attr.desc: In a small town encircled by trees, mysterious events are unfolding. Pet rabbits are going missing, people have been injured, and the townsfolk are whispering about something lurking in the woods... Since none of the adults want to do anything about this, it's going to be up to you to get to the bottom of it. Before you can do that, however, simply getting into the woods might be a problem.
attr.inst:
Download the game from Itch, https://caramel.itch.io/redtrees tested with Windows version. Copy all assets to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays.

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 1
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 1 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck1/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 2
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 2 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck2/gamedata folder.

attr.title: REDO!
attr.desc: REDO! - Dark Sci-Fi Metroidvania inspired by the works of Tsutomu Nihei, Lovecraft and others. REDO! is a game about a girl trying to find another human in a dystopian world overrun by biomachines. It's a lonely and evocative game about exploring the unknown and overcoming obstacles to see what is left.
attr.inst: Copy and paste the game assets from your purchased copy of REDO! to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Relic Hunters
attr.desc: Relic Hunters Zero: Remix is a remaster of the FREE 1 million player hit game about blasting evil space ducks and turtles with tiny cute guns. It's fast, it's tactical, and feels deliciously smooth to play. Unlock new weapons, characters and relics to defeat the Ducan Commander!
attr.inst: Download game from https://www.gog.com/en/game/relic_hunters_zero_remix, install, copy data.win and .dat files to /ports/relichunters/gamedata

attr.title: Reminiscence
attr.desc: A reimplementation of the Flashback game using the reminiscence engine by Alex Chermenin.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC version copied to ports/reminiscence/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Restore PortMaster
attr.desc: Restore PortMaster is a script designed to restore a broken PortMaster installation.
attr.inst: Download this "Port" then run the "Restore PortMaster.sh" from within your Ports Directory. This will restore PortMaster to the latest stable version with default settings.

attr.title: Retro Time
attr.desc: RetroTime is a game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes being Retro Carousel, Time Attack and Lives mode.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein
attr.desc: Return to Castle Wolfenstein using the iortcw project.  With porting work done by JohnnyonFlame.  Packaged by Romadu.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own pak0.pk3, sp_pak1.pk3, sp_pak2.pk3, and sp_pak3.pk3 to the ports/iortcw/main folder.

attr.title: Reverse Bros
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Ri-li
attr.desc: A simple and fun arcade-style game in which you control a wooden toy train and collect wooden letters while avoiding obstacles.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Rick Dangerous
attr.desc: An open source implementation of the legendary game "Rick Dangerous" using the xrick libretro retroarch core.
attr.inst: All necessary files are already included.

attr.title: Rigel Engine
attr.desc: A modern re-implementation of the classic DOS game Duke Nukem II.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full game files to the ports/RigelEngine/ folder.

attr.title: Riptale
attr.desc: Riptale is a challenging 2D roguelike action game aiming to make sword combat be as bloody and impactful as possible. The player collects gems that allow them to execute different attacks in the order of their choosing. All this results in a symphony of combos that fill the screen with blood and guts.
attr.inst: Purchase from Steam Using only the latest Steam or Windows version, locate game.unx/data.win, audiogroup1.dat & audiogroup2.dat, and all 8 folders. Place each of those files and folders inside the gamedata folder. Note: no need to rename game.unx
attr.inst_md: Purchase from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/616000/Riptale/) Using only the latest Steam or Windows version, locate game.unx/data.win, audiogroup1.dat & audiogroup2.dat, plus all 8 folders. Place each of those files and folders inside the gamedata folder. Note: no need to rename game.unx
