items: Rise of the Triad - The Hunt Begins.sh
Rise of the Triad - Dark War.sh

attr.title: Rise of the Triad
attr.desc: An open source port of Rise of the Triad by icculus.  The shareware files for the first episode are included.  The registered game files will be required to play Dark War.
attr.inst: The demo files are already included for the first episode.  To play Dark War you will need to provide your DARKWAR.WAD, DARKWAR.RTC, and DARKWAR.RTL game files in the /ports/rott/ directory.

attr.title: Risk of Rain (2013)
attr.desc: Risk of Rain is an action platformer with roguelike elements. With permanent death as a primary feature, players will have to play their best to get as far as possible. Fight on a mysterious planet with randomly spawning enemies and bosses.
attr.inst: Buy the game on Steam and place all windows assets in the "riskofrain" portfolder.

attr.title: RITE
attr.desc: RITE is a high-speed precision platformer where you must conquer a series of demanding trials, a rite of passage for every Nim. Find the key and reach the exit to move on to the next trial, and maybe collect some gold along the way. Who knows, they could prove valuable to those who like a brutal challenge..
attr.inst: Locate the data.win file from the windows version of RITE. Copy this file to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Rlone: A Rogue Clone
attr.desc:
Rlone is a real-time rogue clone. The result of a 2 week, friendly competition to create a roguelike using whatever tools we desired. 

This game features procedural map generation, random weapon and enemy stats, and difficulty and complexity scaling as you descent further into lower floors. It also supports modifications to the graphics, audio, and other things through the config files in "res/cfg/".
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: Rlvm (deprecated)
attr.desc: Rlvm is a Free Software reimplementation of the Key RealLive interpreter for Visual Novels. Notable games include CLANNAD, AIR, & KANON. (Superseeded by dedicated ports for each VN).
attr.inst: Add your game files to the ports/rlvm/games/GAME_NAME directory, multiple games can be installed and you will get a choice of which game you want to play at launch. HD Releases do not currently work properly.

attr.title: Road Invaders
attr.desc: An action game that's part vertical-scrolling racer, part match-2 game. Move your car and punch cubes, matching cubes to shift gear on your way to achieving the highest score!
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Rocks N Diamonds
attr.desc: A Boulderdash type game by Holger Schemel with many unique features, such as the ability to play remade levels from Boulderdash, Emerald Mine and Supaplex and many more levels.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Roguelight
attr.desc: The deeper you travel the darker it gets, and you only have your arrows to light the way.
attr.inst: Download game from https://managore.itch.io/roguelight. The .exe download is actually a compressed archive; open it 7-zip or some other archiver to extract the files. Copy data.win and .mp3 files to /ports/roguelight/gamedata

attr.title: ROTA
attr.desc:
Rotate gravity as you walk over the edge!
Push, pull and rotate gravity-blocks to traverse the stage and solve puzzles.
Collect all 50 gems to unlock doors and explore 8 vibrant worlds!
Listen to an original ambient soundtrack that will keep you relaxed while solving challenging puzzles. (:
Watch out for spikes! 0:
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Rotational Shift
attr.desc: A team of workers are tasked with processing boxes and have to meet the quota in the time limit. The catch? Every time the wheel spins, a worker is selected at random to work the next shift. With such short margins, all workers must play a part in helping each other be as effective as possible, so that no second is wasted.
attr.inst: Download game from https://gleeson.itch.io/rotational-shift. Place data.win in /ports/rotationalshift/gamedata

attr.title: Russian Subway Dogs
attr.desc: A fast-paced arcade game inspired by the real-life stray dogs of the Moscow metro. Juggle vodka, bark fire, cook bears, and more! Can you steal enough food to survive?
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/762610/Russian_Subway_Dogs/ copy data.win and all .ini files to /ports/russiansubwaydogs/gamedata

attr.title: RVGL
attr.desc: An open source port of Re-Volt by the RV Team.
attr.inst: Necessary files will be downloaded and installed upon initial launch while connected to the internet.

attr.title: Satryn
attr.desc: A chaotic, infinite twin stick shooty! 12 fearsome baddies (not cuddly), 9 power-ups that will make you smile and say “i’m having fun”, 5 hazards that add to the chaotic nature of this strange place, a manual that reveals helpful hints and useless lore as you discover things, and the love of your friends makes you stronger
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Savant Ascent
attr.desc:
A malicious orb has cast Savant out of his tower and transformed his surroundings into dangerous enemies!

Dodge and shoot your way back up the tower, and blast down waves of enemies as you make your way towards the top! As you progress, you unlock CDs that not only give you new tracks to play to, but also grant you powerful new abilities!

Can you make it to the top?
attr.inst:
Make sure to buy the original version of Savant Ascent: https://store.steampowered.com/app/259530/Savant__Ascent/

Note: dual analog sticks are required for this game!

Go to your steam directory and copy all files from Savant Ascent into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Saving Princess
attr.desc:
You are Portia Crane, Asset Recovery Specialist.
All you know about your mission is:
"IF THEY GET PRINCESS, THE WAR IS LOST.
IT'S UP TO YOU."
Explore a space station crawling with rogue machines and even rival bounty hunters with the same objective as you - but with far, far different intentions!
Expand your arsenal as you collect upgrades to your trusty arm cannon and armor!
Test your might against several bosses - including a FREAKING SPACE NINJA!
Can you SAVE PRINCESS?
attr.inst:
Head to https://brainos.itch.io/savingprincess.
Purchase the game and download Saving Princess.exe and place it into ports/
Works with Saving Princess - DEMO - Windows.exe too!
attr.inst_md:
Head to https://brainos.itch.io/savingprincess.
Purchase the game and download Saving Princess.exe and place it into ports/
Works with Saving Princess - DEMO - Windows.exe too.

attr.title: Scale the Skull Tower
attr.desc: Can you climb the tower and defeat the evil necromancer? Jump from ledge to ledge and throw your sword into walls to make MORE LEDGES! Also, bounce on some slimes.
attr.inst: You can download Scale the Skull Tower for free at: https://cortok.itch.io/scaletheskulltower. Download the *Scale the Skull Tower JAM VERSION (LINUX).zip* version and extract it, and place the *Game.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: SDL Sopwith
attr.desc: SDL Sopwith is a port of the game Sopwith, which was originally by BMB CompuScience Canada.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: SDLPoP
attr.desc: An open-source port of Prince of Persia, based on the disassembly of the DOS version, extended with new features by NagyD
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Secret Tea Garden
attr.desc: A cozy looking Tea Party where you must serve townspeople their tea while dodging hurdles and maneuvering around obstacles.
attr.inst: Download from https://angusbeer.itch.io/Secret-Tea-Garden then extract and place data.win into gamedata folder
attr.inst_md: Download from [Angus Beer](https://angusbeer.itch.io/secret-tea-garden) then extract and place data.win inside gamedata folder

attr.title: Septuple
attr.desc: A precision platformer about the septuple jump paper! Created by NNB.
attr.inst: Download septuple.x86_64 from https://nnbnh.itch.io/septuple and place it into gamedata folder.

attr.title: Serious Sam - The First Encounter
attr.desc: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline arcade-action shooter heavily focused on frantic arcade-style single player action. Sam travels through the beautiful world of ancient Egypt and several diverse planets, confronting countless Mental’s minions on his way to the Mental’s base. This source port of Serious Sam was originally modded to work on the Dragonbox Pyra handheld. GL video accelerated with GL4ES by ptitseb (same dev who also does box86 and box64)!
attr.inst: You will need to populate the sstfe directory with your game data.  Copy all contents except the 'Bin' folder from your Serious Sam - The First Encounter Classic GOG, Steam, or CD install and DO NOT overwrite existing files.  The Serious Sam Classics: Revolution copy of The First Encounter works, too

attr.title: Serious Sam - The Second Encounter
attr.desc: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline arcade-action shooter heavily focused on frantic arcade-style single player action. Sam travels through the beautiful world of ancient Egypt and several diverse planets, confronting countless Mental’s minions on his way to the Mental’s base. This source port of Serious Sam was originally modded to work on the Dragonbox Pyra handheld. GL video accelerated with GL4ES by ptitseb (same dev who also does box86 and box64)!
attr.inst: You will need to populate the sstse directory with your game data.  Copy all contents except the 'Bin' folder from your Serious Sam - The Second Encounter Classic GOG, Steam, or CD install and DO NOT overwrite existing files.  The Serious Sam Classics: Revolution copy of The Second Encounter works, too

attr.title: Seven Kingdoms - Ancient Adversaries
attr.desc: A long, long time ago, when people lived among gods and monsters, seven kingdoms struggled for rule over the land. Lead one of those civilizations to glory through sophisticated trade, diplomacy, espionage and conquest. Choose from one of seven cultures: Greek, Persian, Viking, Norman, Mayan, Chinese and Japanese and compete for domination. Each Race in Seven Kingdoms has its own distinct advantages and disadvantages, its own unique God unit, a different military skill, its own strengths and weaknesses. Learn how to use them! Use military means, economy or subterfuge to bring down your enemies. And don't forget about brute force, cunning and intelligence.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Shadow Warrior
attr.desc: Shadow Warrior open source port by Jonathan Fowler.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version SW.GRP and SW.RTS Shadow Warrior files to the ports/shadow-warrior folder.

attr.title: Shippy
attr.desc: The Earth is under attack. The only trained pilots, Sora and Fumiko, race to defeat the invaders. The experimental ships are Earth only hope.
attr.inst: Can play in one or two player mode

attr.title: Shipwreck
attr.desc: Shipwreck is a top down adventure game in which you must travel the land, explore dungeons, and defeat monsters to earn safe passage off the island on which you are stranded.  Note there are several games called Shipwreck, this is the one by Brushfire Games.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shipwreck for Linux copied to the ports/shipwreck/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove
attr.desc: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove loader.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shovel Knight Treasure Trove for Linux copied to the ports/shovelknight/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Shrubnaut
attr.desc:
A small metroidvania made in 6 days for a self-imposed GAME-A-WEEK challenge by gleeson.
Use your hookshot to explore a space garden and find all the secrets!

Note: This is a short game, intended to be played in one sitting. Note that there is no save function and the game resets to the beginning after idling for 30 seconds
attr.inst:
Download SHRUBNAUT - Windows.zip from https://gleeson.itch.io/shrubnaut and place the data.win from the zip into /ports/shrubnaut/gamedata.
On first startup, the game will patch the data.win

attr.title: Siege of Osaka
attr.desc: SIEGE OF OSAKA is a retro hybrid of Beat-em-up and Brick Breaker. Send enemy ninja rolling into walls and fortifications to bring down their castles. Localized/parodied for American audiences.
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Simple Sokoban
attr.desc: Simple Sokoban is a simple Sokoban game that supports animated movements,unlimited level solutions, unlimited undos and more. It does not have any sound
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: SkiFree
attr.desc: SkiFree is a single-player skiing computer game created by Chris Pirih and released with Microsoft Entertainment Pack 3 for Windows 3.0 in October 1991.  The SkiFree official site is https://ski.ihoc.net/
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: SkiJump3
attr.desc: Ski Jump International v3
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Smoothie Galaxy
attr.desc: Smoothie Galaxy is an adventure game inspired a lot by Zelda 2D games, you play a spacenaut crashed on an unknown planet and you need to find fours pieces of ship scattered in the world, for repair your ship and escape the planet..
attr.desc_md: *"Smoothie Galaxy is an adventure game inspired a lot by Zelda 2D games, you play a spacenaut crashed on an unknown planet and you need to find fours pieces of ship scattered in the world, for repair your ship and escape the planet.."*
attr.inst: This port is ready to run.
attr.inst_md: This port is ready to run.

attr.title: Snaklipse
attr.desc: Snake game, with the addition of jumping, traps, and the need for speed. Features: Wormholes and jumping, many colors to unlock, and many many stars to eat
attr.inst: All game files are included.

attr.title: SneakR
attr.desc: A short stealth game. Avoid sentries and learn their movements to complete your objective.
attr.inst: Download game from https://josephgribbin.itch.io/sneakr, rename SneakR.exe to SneakR.zip, extract. Copy data.win to /ports/sneakr/gamedata

attr.title: Sneggpit
attr.desc:
Oh no, your friend Cursy has fallen into a pit full of dangerous snakes! Help Cursy to evade the hungry reptiles, steal the snakes' eggs and prevent them from spawning. 
Sneggpit is a charming little arcade game that could have rocked the early eighties - but is brand-new from 2024! While taking some inspiration from all-time classics such as Pacman or Nibbler/Snake, Sneggpit stands out with its unique and highly addictive gameplay and instantly runs on almost any modern device.
attr.inst: Cursy's movements can be controlled using the cursor keys (of course!), by any game controller, or via swipe gestures on mobile touch devices.

attr.title: SNKRX
attr.desc: SNKRX is an arcade shooter roguelite where you control a snake of heroes that automatically attack nearby enemies. Combine different heroes to unlock class bonuses and create unique builds, and steer your unstoppable party as they ravage through endless waves of enemies.
attr.inst: Download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/915310/SNKRX/ and place SNKRX.exe file to the port folder

attr.title: SnOut
attr.desc:
Compete for the top score in this combination of two classic arcade games!
The idea Is Simple:
-You control the snake
-Gain length (and points) for the ball hitting your body
-Body hits power up the ball to destroy blocks and create space
-Just go for as long as you can!
You lose if your head hits the ball, the wall, or your own body!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run!
If your D-pad on your device is poor, go to Menu->Options->Control Scheme: L/R to switch controls to triggers.

attr.title: Sokobrawn
attr.desc: It's like Sokoban but you're really strong.
attr.inst: This port is ready to run!

attr.title: Sonic 1
attr.desc: Sonic the Hedgehog 1 decompilation by Rubberduckycooly.
attr.inst: Add your own Data.rsdk file to the ports/sonic1 folder.

attr.desc: This game is a new universe, inspired in the Master System games series, released by SEGA at 1992.

attr.inst: Copy a rom of Sonic 3 & Knuckles to ports/sonic3air and rename it to `Sonic_Knuckles_wSonic3.bin`.

attr.desc: This game mixes Sonic Chaos and Sonic Triple Trouble in a new universe. Inspired in the Master System games series, released by SEGA between 1993/94.

attr.desc: Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart fangame by Sonic Team Junior.  All necessary files are already included.  !!!Warning!!! This is a 184MB package and will take a while to download and install.

attr.title: Sonic Robo Blast 2
attr.desc: Sonic Robo Blast 2 fangame by Sonic Team Junior.  All necessary files are already included.  !!!Warning!!! This is a 184MB package and will take a while to download and install.

attr.title: Sonic Time Twisted
attr.desc: Sonic Time Twisted is a fan-made game where Sonic must stop Dr. Eggman's plan to use time travel to resurrect Metal Sonic and conquer the world. Sonic travels through past, present, and future versions of levels, collecting Time Stones to thwart Eggman's scheme.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Sonic Triple Trouble - 16-Bit
attr.desc: What if Sonic Triple Trouble had been originally released on the Sega Genesis / MegaDrive, after Sonic 3 & Knuckles?
attr.inst: Download the 32-bit or 64-bit android apk from Gamejolt and put it in `ports/sonictt16b`.

attr.title: SorR
attr.desc: Streets of Rage Remake.
attr.inst: Just add your own sorr.dat file, mod folder, and palettes folder into the ports/sorr folder.  See the wiki for more info on this.

attr.title: Space Cadet Pinball
attr.desc: A reversed engineered version Space Cadet Pinball.
attr.inst: Just add your own Space Cadet Pinball PINBALL.DAT files and sound files to the spacecadetpinball folder.

attr.title: Space Gladiators
attr.desc: Ever dreamt of being a space potato? Now’s your chance! Space Gladiators is a 2D hand-drawn roguelite platformer following a bunch of captives fighting their way out of a planet prison. Defeat hordes of aliens in the gladiatorial arenas and earn your freedom!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/spacegladiators/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1144910/Space_Gladiators/
Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on Space Gladiators >  Manage > Browse local files. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/spacegladiators/gamedata

attr.title: Spacewing War
attr.desc: Blast through adorable enemies in this side scrolling shmup that's sure to remind you of a gameboy classic game, only, this game has over 40 color pallets to choose from.
attr.inst: Purchase from Steam, Pneuma Games https://store.steampowered.com/app/1979470/Spacewing_War  Locate data.win plus audiogroup1 & audiogroup2 files and place them inside the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase from Steam, [Pneuma Games](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1979470/Spacewing_War)  Locate data.win plus audiogroup1 & audiogroup2 files and place them inside the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Spearmint Mountain
attr.desc:
Spearmint Mountain is a short but sweet action platformer, where you take control of a sentient piece of mint that's fallen off the big, sacred Mint. Pick up spear plants, and poke them at enemies or they'll crush you! Throw the spears at walls to create platforms, and bounce off of them to reach new heights!

There are also collectible mint coins hidden in difficult-to-reach locations. How many can you find?
attr.inst: Download game (Spearmint Mountain 1.1.1 Ubuntu) from https://baku.itch.io/spearmint-mountain, copy all the files from /assets to /ports/spearmintmountain/gamedata

attr.title: Spectral Slash
attr.desc: A combat-focused deckbuilder where your weapon deals no damage. Slash enemies to gain energy, use energy to play powerful cards. Add creative modifiers to your cards! Build a  powerful deck! Each loadout has unique playstyle. Try out all 6 loadouts and see which one you like most!
attr.inst: Download the game https://abhimonk.itch.io/spectral-slash and place SpectralSlash.exe file to the port folder

attr.title: Spell Sling
attr.desc: Spell Sling is a classic first-person roguelike with a focus on consumable spells and dungeon crawling
attr.inst: Download the game https://youdoyoubuddy.itch.io/spell-sling and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Spell Tower
attr.desc: Spell Tower is a first person dungeon crawler and deckbuilder hybrid with the usual assortment of interesting card interactions, broken combos and cards with uses you might not have thought of at first.
attr.inst: Download the game https://youdoyoubuddy.itch.io/spell-tower and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Spelunky
attr.desc: Spelunky Classic HD.  A modified version of Derek Yu's game Spelunky Classic. Based on the source code published in Humble Weekly Bundle: Play and Create with GameMaker (not original 1.1 release).
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Spinch
attr.desc: Transcend the material realm and assume your true form as Spinch, a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring, in this side-scrolling, psychedelic platformer from the mind of award-winning Canadian cartoonist, Jesse Jacobs.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/794240/Spinch/ (also available but not tested from gog and humble). Copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/spinch/gamedata

attr.title: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com
attr.desc: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com is a small metroidvania about a ghost hunter named Ruby. One Halloween night a ghost hunting job comes in, but it turns out to not be a regular gig!
attr.inst: Copy the file SpookyGhostsDotCom inside the game folder, if you have the steam version rename the file "SpookyGhostsDotCom-Steam".

attr.title: Spookynakki
attr.desc: Spookynakki is the bone-chilling continuation of Grabanakki, featuring 3 new worlds, a variety of new and returning mechanics, and a completely new OST. Clear level after level of monsters, using the very blocks you stand on as your only weapon. Can you defeat every foe without falling through the shrinking foundation? Don't wait anymore and go clear the 24 spooky stages of block-throwing combat!
attr.inst: Ready to run !

attr.title: Star vs. the Game
attr.desc: Star vs. the Game is a cross between top-down beat-em up action and 2D platforming. Play as both Star and Marco and fight against a threat from beyond reality! The game features 7 levels with four bosses, as well as some extra content once the game is beaten.
attr.inst: Download game from https://rian-shinozaki.itch.io/star-vs-the-game , copy data.win, audiogroup1.dat and all .ogg files to /ports/starvsthegame/gamedata

attr.title: Starcatcher
attr.desc: Starcatcher is a platformer inspired by Kirby, Metroid, Gravitron Experiment. Your goal: Collect stars in outer space.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Stardew Valley
attr.desc: Stardew Valley is an open-ended country-life RPG! You’ve inherited your grandfather’s old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life.
attr.inst:
You must have an updated copy of the *compatibility version* of Stardew Valley. Both Steam or GOG versions are supported. https://www.stardewvalley.net/compatibility/
Copy the retail game's data into the `stardewvalley/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Stargrove Scramble
attr.desc: Your son has been taken! Sling your eggs at foes and platform through three unique worlds in search of his captor. Though tread lightly, his henchmen will try to stop you at every turn.
attr.inst: This port is ready to run. Thanks Team Bugulon for creating this game and allowing us to distribute it!

attr.title: Static
attr.desc: Static is a fast paced puzzle platformer inspired by games such as 'Super Meat Boy' and 'N++'
attr.inst: Get the game on https://martin-akehurst.itch.io/staticgame, rename the .exe to .zip, extract and place all game files in the ports/static/gamedata/ directory.
attr.inst_md: Get the game on the [LoneFoxAndDuck page]https://martin-akehurst.itch.io/staticgame), rename the .exe to .zip, extract and place game files in the ports/static/gamedata/ directory.

attr.title: Steel Assault
attr.desc: Punch, whip, and zipline your way through a post-apocalyptic America in this 16-bit retro-style action platformer!
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Steel Assault for Linux copied to the ports/steelassault/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Stop The Egg Eggspress
attr.desc: A simple remake of Stop the Express mashed up with Chuckie Egg graphics.  Yes, it's a game based around a simple pun.
attr.inst:
Button Mappings for the game

D Pad, Left stick and right stick for movement

Start,X, and Y Button to start game

A and B buttons to shoot an egg

attr.title: Strange Adventures in Infinite Space
attr.desc:
Digital Eel's Strange Adventures in Infinite Space is an incredibly addictive space exploration game that plays like a cross between a board game and Star Control.

The game is best described as the condensed version of Star Control: imagine the same sense of humour you have come to know and love in Accolade's classic, minus the grand plot, mix with more intergalactic business savvy, and you'll have a good idea of what SAIS is all about.
attr.inst: All game files included!

attr.title: Streets of Claus
attr.desc: It was a beautiful Christmas night... Santa Claus was preparing to deliver the last gift of the year, when he was suddenly knocked and fell off his sled. Unfortunately, he fell in a dangerous neighborhood, and now he is going to punch some criminals to make the delivery.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Strikey Sisters
attr.desc:
Say hello to a fantasy themed action arcade brick breaker! Featuring cute characters, silly humor, powerful magic, crazy bosses, and even local 2 player co-op mode!
-Fast-paced brick breaker action!
-Intense boss battles!
-Local 2 player co-op mode.
-Three difficulty modes.
-Travel and conquer the world map in any order you want!
-Unique player, ball, and spell power-ups!
-Highly replayable! Uncover all the map, collect gems, unlock secret areas and extra levels, and complete the bestiary!
-Polished and colorful pixel art visuals.
-Catchy synth-fantasy soundtrack.
-Cheesy 90's game voice acting!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game either from https://dyagames.itch.io/strikey-sisters OR https://store.steampowered.com/app/643880/Strikey_Sisters/ 

Itch.io
Download Strikey Sisters (Linux Ubuntu 14.04 LTS) [updated on Apr 05, 2018],  copy all files from /assets to /ports/strikeysisters/gamedata

Steam
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 643880 643883 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy all files from /assets to /ports/strikeysisters/gamedata

attr.title: SuDokuL
attr.desc: SuDokul is a multiplatform Sudoku game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Sulka
attr.desc: A simple platformer. Help Sulka find a new home.

attr.title: The Legend of Sword and Fairy
attr.desc: The Legend of Sword and Fairy, is a Chinese language fantasy video game series and media franchise centered on a series of nine Chinese mythology/xianxia-themed adventure role-playing computer games created by Yao Zhuangxian.​
attr.desc_md: The Legend of Sword and Fairy (Chinese: 仙劍奇俠傳; pinyin: Xiānjiàn Qíxiá Zhuàn), also known as Sword and Fairy (仙劍) or Chinese Paladin, is a Chinese language fantasy video game series and media franchise centered on a series of nine Chinese mythology/xianxia-themed adventure role-playing computer games created by Yao Zhuangxian. The eponymous first game in the series is released for MS-DOS CLI in 1995 by the 'Crazy Boyz' team (狂徒創作群) of the Taiwanese game developing and publishing company Softstar Entertainment (大宇資訊). It is one of the so-called 'Twin Swords of Softstar' (大宇雙劍) along with the sister Xuan-Yuan Sword series, and has been widely regarded as one of the (if not the) most iconic Chinese RPG series ever made.​

attr.desc: Unlikely is a dice game with a hungry clown. Roll the dice to score points; reach 10 points to advance. If you exceed 10 points, you get an extra roll. You can also roll the big die for a bonus card, but there’s only a 66.6% chance of success.
attr.inst: Download the unlikely.rar from the Itch.io Page https://nachogames.itch.io/unlikely and extract it, Copy the Unlikely.pck in the unlikely/gamedata folder

attr.title: Upo
attr.desc:
Upo is a procedurally generated music game.
Your goal is to avoid collision with flying objects in rhytm to the music.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Ur-Quan Masters
attr.desc:
The Ur-Quan Masters is a 2002 open source fangame modification, based on the action-adventure science fiction game Star Control II.

!!!Warning!!! This is a 369MB package and will take a while to download and install.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
attr.desc: VA-11 HALL-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action is a booze em' up about waifus, technology, and post-dystopia life. In this world, corporations reign supreme, all human life is infected with nanomachines designed to oppress them, and the terrifying White Knights ensure that everyone obeys the laws..
attr.inst: To boot copy the data.win/game.unx files and all the folder inside the gamedata folder and then boot the game from Valhalla.sh.

attr.title: VanillaRA
attr.desc: Vanilla Conquer is a fully portable version Command and Conquer Red Alert.
attr.inst: The game comes with the demo files, read the README for detailed information on installing the full game.

attr.title: VanillaTD
attr.desc: Vanilla Conquer is a fully portable version Command and Conquer Tiberium Dawn.
attr.inst: The game comes with the demo files, read the README for detailed information on installing the full game.

attr.title: VCMI - Heroes of Might and Magic III
attr.desc: VCMI is a fully portable version of Heroes of Might and Magic III.
attr.inst: Copy the GoG installer files to ports/vcmi and it will install the game files as required, see the README for more information.

attr.title: Vertical Drop Heroes HD
attr.desc: Vertical Drop Heroes is a procedural platformer RPG hybrid with roguelike elements, where your hero adventures through randomly generated stages. Armed with a variety of skills and traits, you must use your cunning and reflexes to survive the dangers of each stage.
attr.inst: Place game files on the ports/verticaldropheroeshd/gamedata/ directory.
attr.inst_md: Place game files on the ports/verticaldropheroeshd/gamedata/ directory.

attr.title: Viral Reload
attr.desc: Viral Reload is an infinite wave-based shoot-em-up with a unique dash mechanic. Blast away at deadly viruses, mechanical hybrids, and two unique bosses. Dash through bullets, lasers, and enemies to stay alive and score!
attr.inst: You can purchase Viral Reload at: https://retrocademedia.itch.io/viral-reload. Download the Linux version and extract it, and place the *Viral Reload.pck* file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the *Viral Reload Linux.zip*, Jan 26, 2022 release.

attr.title: vitaSnake
attr.desc: A snake game with smooth rotation made for the PS Vita with LibVita2D. Turn left and right to collect as many apples as you can, but avoid biting your tail, or you will lose the game.
attr.inst: Ready to run !

attr.title: Void Stranger
attr.desc: A sokoban-style puzzle adventure. Traverse a forgotten labyrinth in search of your memories. Do you remember why you are here?
attr.desc_md:
*Void Stranger* is a 2D sokoban-style puzzle game where every step counts. Descend into the forgotten labyrinth teeming with fiendish foes and traps that defy reason. A swift defeat lurks at every corner for those who neither study their surroundings nor think their moves through with care.
Trust you wits and slowly, surely, you will conquer the mysteries before you.

You do remember why you are here, right? Or have you lost something? Something very important to you.
attr.inst: Place game .png, .dat, .csv, and .win files in the "gamedata" folder. Game must be v1.1.1, Steam or Itch supported. The game will take 3-5 minutes to boot for the first time only.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game via [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2121980/Void_Stranger/) or [Itch](https://system-erasure.itch.io/void-stranger).
Currently supporting v1.1.1 off Steam and Itch.
Place all `.png`, `.dat`, `.csv`, and `.win` files in the `gamedata` folder.
The game will take 3-5 minutes to boot for the first time only.

attr.title: VVVVVV
attr.desc: VVVVVV is a 2010 puzzle-platform game created by Terry Cavanagh.
attr.inst: The free Make and Play Edition data.zip file is already included.  You can also add your own purchased copy of the data.zip from your VVVVVV into the ports/VVVVVV folder if you prefer that version instead.

attr.title: Waking Mars
attr.desc: Waking Mars is a one-of-a-kind adventure in which you jetpack through subterranean Mars encountering a host of extraordinary alien lifeforms that operate as a living, breathing ecosystem.
attr.inst:
Add your Linux (humble) game files to the gamedata folder

File structure:
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars_files
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars.png

attr.title: Waternet
attr.desc: Waternet is a puzzle game where you to connect pipes to each other so that water flows through it.
attr.inst: All files included!

attr.title: Wetspot 2
attr.desc: A port of QuickBasic 4.5 game Wetspot 2 by Angelo Mottola.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Widelands
attr.desc:
A real-time build-up strategy game
You are the regent of a small clan. Your task is to build an ever growing settlement. Every member of your clan will do his or her part to produce more resources to further this growth.

Widelands offers a single-player mode with campaigns that tell stories of the tribes and their struggle in the Widelands universe. However, settling really starts when you unite with friends over the Internet or LAN to build up new empires together – or to crush each other in the dusts of war. Widelands also offers an artificial intelligence to challenge you.
attr.inst:
All game files included, optional Mods can be installed at will.
Main Menu Windows can be dragged if screen is too small.

attr.title: Wizard Orb
attr.desc: A challenging little puzzle-platformer game where platforms appear and disappear each time you leap.
attr.inst: You can download Wizard Orb for free at: https://slimewitch.itch.io/wizard-orb. Download the *windows.zip* version and extract it, and place the *index.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Wizardchase
attr.desc:
2D retro pacman like arcade game

Collect all the treasure in the dungeon!  Can you make it to the second level? 
Leave your highest score in the comments.  Good luck!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Wizznic
attr.desc: Wizznic! is an open-source, freeware remake of Puzznic, recreating the original arcade levels, the NES ones and including fan-made puzzle packs with new custom levels. The gameplay remains exactly the same, where the player has to move individual tiles, arranging them inside a restricted space to create groups of identical blocks and make all disappear by touching each other. Elevators and other features gradually start to appear on later levels.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Wordle SDL
attr.desc:
Wordle SDL is a port of a clone of Wordle made with SDL.

Wordle is a web-based word game created and developed by Welsh software engineer Josh Wardle, and owned and published by The New York Times Company since 2022. Players have six attempts to guess a five-letter word, with feedback given for each guess in the form of colored tiles indicating when letters match or occupy the correct position.
attr.inst: All files are included and ready.

attr.title: Words With Freds
attr.desc: Guess the five letter word within six attempts! Thousands of words to guess! Features 24 different color palettes and 8 background options.
attr.inst: This game is ready to run. Special thanks to Fred Wood for allowing PortMaster to distribute the game!

attr.title: World of Goo
attr.desc: World of Goo is a multiple award winning physics based puzzle / construction game made entirely by two guys. Drag and drop living, squirming, talking, globs of goo to build structures, bridges, cannonballs, zeppelins, and giant tongues. The millions of Goo Balls that live in the beautiful World of Goo are curious to explore - but they don't know that they are in a game, or that they are extremely delicious.
attr.inst: Copy your GOG World of Goo .sh into the Port folder or copy your Linux Game files (WorldOfGoo.bin.x86_64 renamed to WorldOfGoo.bin and GameFolder) to the worldofgoo gamedata folder.

attr.title: World War II GI
attr.desc: World War 2 GI using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version WW2GI.GRP and WW2DI.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-WWII/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Worship Vector
attr.desc: Worship Vector is a Tower Defense type game. The game is based upon a unique map, which extends automatically.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Xenon Valkyrie
attr.desc: Xenon Valkyrie is a rogue-like with many RPG elements in which you will have to get to the deepest part of a moon and finish the plans of a wicked witch. You will be able to get many weapons randomly as you fight in a world that is created every time you play.
attr.inst:
Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/573780/Xenon_Valkyrie/,
copy copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/xenonvalkyrie/gamedata

attr.title: xkcd Hoverboard
attr.desc: Standalone version of xkcd 1608 Hoverboard game
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T
attr.desc: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T (or just yellow jacket) is a vaporwave arcade shoot-em-up about a motorcyclist running from the government in this classic 80s style arcade shmup! Can you get the highest score?
attr.inst: Download the game on itch.io page and retrieve the file data.win from the Y E L L O W - J A C K E T.zip. After, data.win needs to be place on to the folder ports/yellowjacket/gamedata.

attr.title: Yarntown
attr.desc: You’ve come on the night of the hunt. The streets of this cursed, gothic town are overrun with beasts, and what has become of the men who tried to hunt them before. Explore the twisting roads, go toe to toe with powerful foes, and uncover Yarntown’s dark secrets.
attr.inst: Download game from https://solarus-games.org/games/yarntown/ and put the .solarus file in ports/yarntown.

attr.title: Yatka
attr.desc:
YATKA is one of many Tetris implementations available. Motivation behind this one was, on the one hand, to create a game that would conform to modern rules of the game, while, on the other, to make possible running it on resource-limited platforms (e.g. Bittboy or JZ4760-based handheld consoles).
Two Classic themes by Tekkenfede included.
attr.inst: All file included, boot the game and play

youdiedbanry.zip.name: youdiedbanry.zip
items: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You.sh

attr.title: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You
attr.desc:
You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! And will keep bringing you back to their crazy tower of death until you reach the top floor and get rid of them, allowing you to finally be free...
Can you stop this madness?
Or will you give up?
Reaching the top is no easy feat!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/you-died-but-a-necromancer-revived-you OR https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037100/You_Died_but_a_Necromancer_revived_you/

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1037100 1037102 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata

Itch:
Download YouDied_BaNRY_linux.zip an copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata

attr.title: You Have 10 Seconds (2023)
attr.desc:
You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade platformer where you’re spawned into a level and given ten seconds to work out how to reach the exit without dying before time runs out.

There are 25 Areas which each introduce a new mechanic to the gameplay, eventually creating extremely complex and difficult levels. Master collecting keys, swimming through acid, dodging motion sensors, time traveling, swapping dimensions, and so much more to clear areas as quickly as possible.
attr.inst:
Claim the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2390510/You_Have_10_Seconds_2023/
Download the game and copy all the game files from /You Have 10 Seconds (2023) into youhave10s2023/gamedata

attr.title: Z-Warp
attr.desc: Z-Warp is an intense vertical shoot’em up presented in retro pixel art style, featuring frenetic arcade-inspired action where blasters, bombs and KILLER specials are your only allies.
attr.inst:
Purchase from Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990820/ZWarp/
Locate data.win and place it inside the corresponding gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990820/ZWarp/) 
Locate data.win and place it inside the corresponding gamedata folder.

attr.title: Zelda II: Enhanced
attr.desc: Zelda II Enhanced adds a ton of QoL improvements, widescreen, new areas, and new collectibles. The game is arguably much easier to play through.
attr.inst: Download the .zip from https://hoverbat.itch.io/ziiaol and put in the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the .zip from https://hoverbat.itch.io/ziiaol and put in the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Zelda Navi's Quest
attr.desc:
At the end of the Time of Triumph, Link left Hyrule to take well-deserved holidays far from the kingdom's restlessness. Link set sail to discover distant lands and paradise islands where he gladly spent the many rupees he had borrowed from the princess.

Yet, his holiday took a decisive turn on a small island where he heard interesting rumours.

Those rumours were about a very special island, the most fabulous beach resort, the marvellous Fairy Island. Link was very curious about it, and set sail again to see it by himself.

But what he found there wan't quite what he expected: a quick and painful death killed by a sea monster. His body was washed ashore on a beach...
attr.inst:
RTR
To continue dialogues you need to press accept. 
Also to go after the boot image

attr.title: Zelda Oni Link Begins
attr.desc: Brought down by a terrible curse since his recent victory on the Dark Lord, Link is changing, day by day, into a powerful creature with a destructive nature named Oni-Link. Bannished from Hyrule, the young hylian asks the princess Zelda some help. She shows him his last hope: a portal to a secret world.

Also to go after the boot image

Until the day when, after months spent watching out for an attack, an event came up and put an end to this endless waiting...

attr.title: Ziggurat
attr.desc: A short adventure game featuring a dreamy atmosphere and strange characters.

attr.title: Znax
attr.desc: Znax is a remake of a game by Nick Kouvaris. It is a sort of puzzle / arcade game where you as the player need to select 4 blocks of the same color and form rectangles as big as you can
